name: Sony MDR ZX110 ZX Series Headphones - Full Size, 30mm Drivers, Lightweight, Swivel Design, Tangle Free Cord, Black - MDR

reviews.name: Sony MDRZX110/BLK ZX-Series Compact Folding Headphones
reviews.reviewText: Great product in cheap price. I ordered this for my wife and she like it very much.
reviews.title: Great Sound!!

reviews.name: Sony MDRZX110/BLK ZX-Series Compact Folding Headphones
reviews.reviewText:
I got a set of these headphones and I expected it to be just like all the other headphones you buy that sound bad in this price range, but I wanted to get a set of headphones to use with my smartphone to listen to my music.

Upon buying it, and plugging it in...and playing my first song...I was UNBELIEVABLY SURPRISED to find out that the headphones actually KICK BUTT!!!...I mean don't get me wrong, I have had much better sounding headphones, but I have also paid $200+ for them!!.

These headphones honestly sound VERY good, and to add yet a bonus to them, which i didn't even realize until after I had bought them...but you can use them with your smartphone to actually make phone calls!!

Not only do the headphones make the people you are calling sound VERY good, much better than even using the phone by itself (in stereo etc)...but the microphone that it has allows the people you call to hear YOU very clearly !!!

So beyond using the headphones to listen to music on my smartphone, I envision using them ALL THE TIME to make phone calls etc.

I must say, GREAT WORK SONY !!!

I wholeheartedly recommend these headphones people !

Oh yea...they are very comfortable as well..unlike a lot of headphones that tend to hurt after wearing them for an extended period of time....good stuff !
reviews.title: GREAT sound for the price!!

reviews.name: Sony MDRZX110/BLK ZX-Series Compact Folding Headphones
reviews.reviewText: I like these headphones because they have great quality and sound for cheap price. They kind have the feeling of noise canceling headphones. I like the one with the mic so I can use with my cell phone
reviews.title: Greatest pair headphones I've ever bought

reviews.name: Sony MDRZX110/BLK ZX-Series Compact Folding Headphones
reviews.reviewText: I'm a small female and found these headphones to be quite tight on my ears. I tried adjusting the head piece, only causing them to fall off my head.
reviews.title: Good sound..very compact fit

reviews.name: Sony MDRZX110/BLK ZX-Series Compact Folding Headphones
reviews.reviewText: This was a good product, but after 4 months one of the sides stopped working so i was left with one functioning earpiece. Overall good but quality could be s little bit better
reviews.title: Good while it lasted
